backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing per-user diary entries (date, mood, reflection) stored in a Map by Principal, and providing a static array of 10 motivational messages with query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: motivational message collection, random message display on home page, and post-breathing-exercise message display, all with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 13 frontend files covering global styles, routing, pages (welcome, home, breathing, diary), components (layout, forms, lists, cards), and custom hooks for queries and breathing timer logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, defining design tokens for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, 'Calma-Mente' title, root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining root layout with four routes (/, /home, /breathing, /diary) and their corresponding page components, wrapped in Layout component.
frontend/src/components/DiaryEntryForm.t: Form component with mood selector (8 emoji options) and reflection textarea that submits new diary entries via React Query mutation with toast notifications and loading states.
frontend/src/components/DiaryEntryList.t: Scrollable list displaying user's diary entries in reverse chronological order with mood emojis, formatted timestamps, and reflection text, handling loading/error/empty states.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout wrapper providing header with logo and Internet Identity login/logout controls, semi-transparent meditation background image, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalMess: Reusable card component displaying an italicized motivational message with sparkle icon and refresh button, featuring gradient background and loading state support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating and refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingTimer.ts: Custom React hook that manages a breathing exercise timer with three phases (inhale, hold, exhale) of 4 seconds each, providing start, pause, reset controls and cycle counting.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching diary entries, adding new entries, and retrieving motivational messages from the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a calming sage green and lavender color palette, plus breathing animation keyframes for inhale/exhale/hold effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/BreathingExercisePage: Breathing exercise page with animated visual guide, phase instructions, cycle counter, and motivational messages displayed after completing breathing cycles.
frontend/src/pages/DiaryPage.tsx: Diary page requiring Internet Identity authentication, displaying a form to create new entries and a list of existing entries in a two-column layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying a random motivational message and two feature cards linking to breathing exercises and mindfulness diary with authentication status awareness.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Welcome page component that displays the Calma-Mente logo, introduction text, and three navigation cards (Home, Breathing, Diary) with a call-to-action button to begin the journey.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, font families (Inter), custom shadows (soft, glow), border radius variables, and keyframe animations for accordions and fade-in effects.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting Calma-Mente app features including welcome screen, breathing exercises, diary with mood tracking, Internet Identity authentication, motivational messages, and calming visual design theme.
